overview:
As a Principal at Ignition, Bryceâ€™s primary responsibility is to help Ignition clients recruit, retain and develop exceptional talent. Bryce also leads the Technical Recruiting Practice which identifies top technical talent, leadership and future founders.

Previously, Bryce served as a Director at Walker Talent Group, a boutique human capital firm focused on large-scale turnarounds and hyper-growth companies. At Walker Talent Group, Bryce led talent acquisition efforts for some of the firmâ€™s largest clients. His work ranged from the Board of Directors to Manager level in Software & Hardware Engineering, Sales, Marketing, Operations and Industrial Design across North America and Europe.

Bryce began his career in human capital management at Riviera Partners, a firm focused on recruiting for premiere venture-backed technology companies. At Riviera, Bryce successfully executed dozens of technical searches at the CXO, SVP and VP level across multiple industries including: consumer internet, retail, mobile, wireless, enterprise software & appliances and eCommerce. In addition to his recruiting projects, Bryce also helped Riviera build and develop their contingent technical recruiting organization and formalize their best practices for recruiting and research process.

Bryce holds a Bachelor of Science Degree in Bioengineering: Bioinformatics from the University of California, San Diego and was selected as a National Collegiate Scholar.
